from pygame import *
from pygame.locals import *
import sys
from server import Snake, SnakeID
import time
import random

# pygame init
init()

#creating our game level dimensions
gamewitdh = 900
gameheigh = 900

#creating an object for drawing rectangles
GREEN = (34,139,34)
blue = (0,0,200)
white = (255,255,255)
red = (255,0,0)

theScore = 0

font = image.load_font(None, 36)
#fontheight = font.get_height()

clock = time.Clock()
screen = display.set_mode((gamewitdh, gameheigh))

KEEPRUNNING = True
#___________________GLOBALS VARIABLES___________________
screen.fill((0,0,0))
display.flip()
run = True

head = (400,400)
start = (5,0)
direction = (1,0)
found_fruit = False
up = (0, -1)
down = (0,1)
left = (-1,0)
right = (1,0)
facing = right

fruit = None #
